name: Calo Inc.
description: Operator of a food-tech platform intended to provide nutritious meals. The company's platform provides a wide range of personalized meal plans as per diet requirements through nutritionist-approved algorithms, enabling users to get healthy food delivered to their doorstep with the help of an application.
one_liner: Operator of a food-tech platform intended to provide nutritious meals.
